div.p:
Antonio:
At this point of the program, we all know what our own level of biological risk is, and what would be low risk for us. We also know what outcomes we want, and we’ve identified the choices we’re willing to make to get those outcomes. We’re aware of the support as well as the challenges, within us and around us. This awareness has given us the tools we need to get the outcomes we want. But, unused tools have never built anything. So, how committed are we to making this happen? Let’s take a look.
